DOC.brief_summary: Prospective , 2-arm , clinical study evaluation VelaShape device Contour I V3 device non-invasive fat reduction vs. control . All study subject , schedule abdominoplasty , undergo one treatment VelaShape Contour I V3 device . Each arm treat different device : Arm 1 : subject treat VelaShape device Arm 2 : subject treat Contour I V3 device
DOC.brief_title: VelaShape Contour I V3 Abdominal Fat Reduction vs. Control
DOC.detailed_description: Eligible subject undergo one treatment one abdominal subarea . Another abdominal subarea remain without treatment serve control . Biopsies treat untreated area harvest abdominoplasty cultured.. Treatment VelaShape perform arm 1 , treatment Contour I V3 perform arm 2 , accord study protocol . Each arm divide 6 sub-groups , accord follow time interval VelaShape UltraShape treatment surgery : Sub-group 1 : Surgery immediately treatment Sub-group 2 : Surgery 10 day treatment Sub-group 3 : Surgery 20 day treatment Sub-group 4 : Surgery 30 day treatment Sub-group 5 : Surgery 60 day treatment Sub-group 6 : Surgery 90 day treatment Each Sub-group contain 2 subject .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Signed informed consent participate study . 2 . Scheduled date surgery ( abdominoplasty ) . 3 . Agree provide sample histology abdominoplasty . 4 . Female male subject , 18 60 year age time enrollment 5 . Fitzpatrick Skin Type I VI . 6 . For Contour I V3 treatment : Abdominal fat thickness least 1.5 cm ( measure calibrate caliper ) . 7 . Female subject must either postmenopausal , surgically sterilize , use medically acceptable form birth control least 3 month prior enrollment ( i.e. , oral contraceptive , contraceptive implant , barrier method spermicide abstinence ) . 8 . General good health confirm medical history skin examination treat area . 9 . Willing follow treatment provide histology sample surgery intend harvest area . 10 . Willingness refrain change diet/ exercise/medication regimen entire course study . 11 . Willing photograph image take treated area use ( deidentification ) evaluation , publication presentations A subject eligible participation study he/she meet follow exclusion criterion : 1 . History hypertension , ischemic heart disease , valvular heart disease , congestive heart failure , pacemaker/defibrillator , abdominal aortic aneurism 2 . Not intend undergo surgery ( abdominoplasty ) 3 . Current hyperlipidemia , diabetes mellitus , hepatitis , liver disease , HIV positive status , blood coagulopathy excessive bleeding , autoimmune connective tissue disease 4 . Having undergoing form treatment active cancer , history skin cancer cancer area treat , include presence malignant pre‐malignant pigment lesion 5 . Having active electrical implant anywhere body , pacemaker internal defibrillator 6 . Having permanent implant treat area , metal plate , injected chemical substance silicone 7 . Having undergone surgery treatment area within 12 month treatment study , include liposuction 8 . Previous body contour procedure treatment area within 12 month 9 . History skin disease treatment area , know tendency form keloid poor wound heal Known photosensitivity 10 . Suffering significant skin condition treatment area inflammatory skin condition , include , limited , open laceration abrasion active cold sore herpes sore prior treatment ( duration resolution per Investigator 's discretion ) treatment course 11 . Skin lesion treatment area simple nevi physical examination ( e.g. , atypical nevus , tattoo , abrasion ) include depressed scar treatment area 12 . Very poor skin quality ( i.e. , severe laxity ) 13 . Abdominal wall diastasis hernia physical examination 14 . Abnormal kidney , liver coagulation function , abnormal lipid profile blood count within last 3 month 15 . Any acute chronic condition , opinion investigator , could interfere conduct study 16 . Unstable weight within last 6 month ( i.e. , ± 3 % weight change prior 6 month ) 17 . Participation another clinical study within last 6 month . 18 . As per Investigator 's discretion , physical mental condition might make unsafe subject participate study .
